statement_html:
For the following system:

\[\begin{aligned} x' = -2x + x^2 + xy\\ y' = -3y + 2y^2 + xy\end{aligned}\]

Find all critical points and classify them according to their types and stability.
statement_latex:
For the following system: \begin{align*}
x' = -2x + x^2 + xy\\
y' = -3y + 2y^2 + xy
\end{align*} Find all critical points and classify them according to
their types and stability.
statement_raw:
For the following system:
<math> \displaystyle 
\begin{align}
x' = -2x + x^2 + xy\\
y' = -3y + 2y^2 + xy
\end{align}
</math>
Find all critical points and classify them according to their types and stability.
